question: In which country, the UNESCO World Heritage Site "The City of Paphos" is located?
explanation: The City of Paphos is located in Cyprus. This city lies on the Mediterranean coast is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This city has been inhabited since the neolithic period. This city was the centre of the cult of Aphrodite, which is considered as the birthplace of Aphrodite. In 12th century B.C., a temple was erected by the Myceneans in her name. This city possesses exceptional architectural and historic value, one such is the "Mosaics of Nea Paphos". It is one of the most beautiful in the world. Paphos is included in the official UNESCO list of Cultural and Natural Treasures of the World's Heritage for its ancient ruins and was selected as a European Capital of Culture for 2017.
